CREATE

Want to become a creator?

If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself. Learn, share, and vote. Our collective action can have a real impact on the future of the Dexit chain. Share your thoughts. Your input can help Dexit reach its maximum potential.

Communicate

Communicate with other community members and bring creative ideas

Create collection

create a collection that can be discussed within community 

Review by community

let others paint on your collection to finalize them within the community 

Content goes live

content can go live after passing each stage for community  review

Thousand of communities love NFT?

A non-fungible token is a unit of data stored on a digital ledger, called a blockchain, that certifies a digital asset to be unique and therefore not interchangeable. NFTs can be used to represent items such as photos, videos, audio, and other types of digital files.
